body.name: Area Rug 2x3 Small Entryway Rug Machine Washable Rug Soft Throw Rug for Entrance Non Slip Non Shedding Low Pile Floor Carpet Doormat for Kitchen Bathroom, Taupe

Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 30 mins
features: 【Non-Slip & Non Shedding】 This vintage rug is equipped with a non-slip backing, providing stability and safety on various flooring surfaces. The rug's non-shedding design minimizes loose fibers, offering a low-maintenance solution and keeping your space clean and tidy.
【Vintage Design】With a charming vintage design, this washable rug adds a touch of classic elegance to your decor, creating a warm and inviting ambiance in any room.

【Low Pile Rug】 The low-hair, high-density construction of this vintage rug offers a plush and luxurious feel underfoot, providing comfort and style in equal measure. Functional low pile allows the area rug for convenient placement in entryways, underneath door and furniture, and will not obstruct doorways.
【Machine Washable】The washable feature of this rug provides easy maintenance, allowing for convenient cleaning and care, making it suitable for busy households and high-traffic areas.

【Warm Notic】Area rug may have temporary creases after you receive it. Please give it some time to flatten itself. There may have slightly color difference between the real goods and pictures due to the light effect. Vacuum regularly to prevent grit from breaking down the fibers. Use a broom to sweep edges clean. Spot clean stains immediately with a mild detergent or carpet cleaning product, then rinse thoroughly and blot dry.

productInformation.value: #1,200,909 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #10,116 in Area Rugs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is a little thinner than I thought it would be but I’m guessing it’s because it’s washable. It’s soft, nice little accent rug for the price and washable you can’t go wrong. It’s a pretty and soft pattern not too gaudy. We will see how it holds up with washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice pattern, perfect entry way rug
reviews.reviewText: I really like the pattern. It's a nice change from the normal woven fiber rugs that do not have any anti-slip coating. The top surface is a bit more coarse than a normal rug, which his expected. I have bought another entry way rug where the top is fuzzy and smooth. Not sure why you would want something that delicate for a heavy traffic area. I think this will last quite a while and since it's machine washable, it should be easy maintenance.The anti slip coating seems high quality and won't lose its tackiness over time. This rug isn't going to slip and slide. My old rugs had trouble staying in one place despite my best effort with rug tape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Middle Of The Road...
reviews.reviewText: It's ok. It is too thin and is clearly a printed type mat. It looks ok though and stays in place fine. I just don't think it will last very long. Also, it is folded in shipping and mine has retained the creases. I am hoping that they will dissipate with time. But with how thin it is, I think those lines may be perminent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not plush nor luxurious, it's a flat mat.
reviews.reviewText: It is a non-slip pad with a small amount of fuzz on it, no one will find it soft. Just a thin door mat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like the pattern on this rug. Rug is thinner than I expected however, it looks nice and stays put.I would say rug is not plush. I put it by the door inside of our garage and it looks very nice. Non-slip!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Washable Rug is the new thing?
reviews.reviewText: I am seeing that washable rigs is the trendy thing at the moment. I got this small rug to place in the entryway of my back kitchen door. I have kids… and a husband —- therefore I find myself constantly cleaning up all day, everyday! How fun! Anyway, I like this rug since I can easily throw it in the washer and it has held up! I let it air dry afterwards! Don’t put it in the dryer!! I also like the neutral colors and the modern touch or adds to the space. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Basically Non-slip, slightly cheap looking
reviews.reviewText: So this is a PRINTED rug. It's completely flat, there are no rug/yarn-like fibers that make this feel like a real rug. It is soft, but it's totally flat.It's basically non-slip. If you're TRYING to make it slip and slide, you can; but for the most part, it stays put.It looks a bit cheap, but it's fine for an entryway; it fits under entry doors, which is nice.

reviews.reviewerName: He who buys too much on AmazonHe who buys too much on Amazon
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little on the thin side
reviews.reviewText: This rug is pretty thin for a rug but that's OK. It makes it easier to throw in the washing machine and will dry faster. At $17 it's fairly cheap if it wears out quickly and needs to be replaced.
